{"id":1197254996,"question_id":3242,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1709869784,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1197254996/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Elements With Maximum Frequency","memory":"22 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxFrequencyElements(vector<int>& nums) {\n  map<int , int>m;\n  int c= 0;\n  int max = 0;\n  for(int i = 0; i<nums.size();i++){\n    m[nums[i]]++;\n  \n\n    if(m[nums[i]]>max){\n      max=m[nums[i]];\n      c=0;\n    }\n\n      if(m[nums[i]]==max)\n      c++;\n  }\n\nreturn c*max;\n        \n}\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-elements-with-maximum-frequency","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
